attributes.action: bring king kong back to birmingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in the 1970's there was a giant plastic statue of king kong that stood in the old bull ring gardens in birmingham city centre

it was sold off and is now owned by a car dealer in scotland

i feel king kong should be bought by the state and presented to the city of birmingham

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
